text:
The Notaries Guild of House [[Sivis]] oversees services tied to the written word. In addition to producing legal documents and authenticating [[letters of credit|letter of credit]] for House [[Kundarak]], the guild licenses cartographers, bookbinders, scribes, translators, accountants, and others in related professions. A number of smaller branches within the Notaries
Guild handle specialized work: ''Aureonâ€™s Press'' is
the primary source of arcane ritual scrolls in the
[[Five Nations]], and the ''Hidden Word'' is a division
that works on cryptography and code-breaking
techniques.
title: Notaries Guild
